name: Judge Morry Vs. Baldo Midget
description:
Judge Morry Vs. Baldo Midget is a short game made for the Computer EmuZone (CEZ) mini-games label to quickly test new programming techniques in small projects. It is a competitive arcade shooting game for two players simultaneously, each controlling one of the characters from the title in local multiplayer. It has a sci-fi story set on the planet Acebuche.

The game is played on a single screen filled with blocks forming platforms. Each player controls a character starting on opposite sides of the screen. The characters can move around, jump and shoot. The goal is to kill the other character first by removing all health shown through meters near the bottom of the screen.
